summary: This mod will change the enchantments of the Non-Hooded Archmage robes, aswell as change the appearance.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will change the enchantments of the Non-Hooded Archmage robes, aswell as change the appearance.

This mod will also make it so the gauntlets actually are being used, as they now are placed alongside the AM-boots. 

I am really sorry, but the socalled hood-less robes are now light armour, and you ALERATIONISTS are not going to like that, but I thought it necesary since there is metal-plating on them. 


I alway though the AM-robes looked kinda ugly, and this mod will change that, BEWARE: You will still need the original textures, and those can be found here --> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20077



HOW TO INSTALL:

- go get yourself something to drink, IN A GLASS (hydration is important)

- now that you have gotten the drink you may drink half of it

- then you may overview the mod page

- and now take just a little sip of your drink thereafter

- it is important to read the description, remember to do that

- take just a little sip more, leaving about 1/4 left in the glass

- now you may click the download with manager button

- while it dowloads you may finish your drink

- And at last you may sit yourself comfertably back in a chair with a straight back

- now you may double-tap the mod in the manager

- adjust your back meanwhile, not to make long term injury

- and then click the \"OK\" button.

- now you may go to the Tribunal Robes mod page, and click download

- You may now maybe get some fruit, with Vitamine C, preffered something that doesn\'t affect you should you have an allergi againt it, such is nasty

- Then click the download button (manual)

- While it is Downloading you may eat the fruit

- When the Dornload is finished you simply move the meshes and textures to the data file, and click yes to all

- CONGRATULATIONS, YOU HAVE NEW ROBES, ARCH MAGE!

..... Just to play skyrim now .....
author: TheFlamingDaedra
